data.name: Mos as pir haven
data.desc: Mosquito shore becomes a pirates’ haven with Capt Blaeuvelt basing operations in Bluefields Bay
data.note:
1589 Bluefields [Mos Shore]. Pirate base est /v L Munoz 2 p 822 /v Levy p 37
 latter half of 1590s. the first Flemish arrivals to the Caribbean Sea, upon arrival of urca captained by Abraham of Madialbur /v O Torres pp 335-336
 by 1616, a Flemish urca (which attacked Spanish Jamaica), was observed repeatedly watering near the San Adres Island and Cape Gracias a Dios, suggesting this area was by then a pirate haven /v O Torres p 336 /v G Diaz pp 182-183.
